job_history.work_description: Provided crisis intervention, trauma-informed care, preventative services, and support services to victims of domestic violence and their families. Conducted daily service logs, case notes, and referral outcome reports.
Conducted crisis intervention over the phone and in person, provided onsite supervision of the shelter and its residents, and taught independent living skills to clients.
Assessed clients and provided crisis intervention, facilitated support groups and life skills workshops, and managed the day-to-day operations of the outreach center.
Handled phone calls, billing and invoicing, accounts receivable and collections, and prepared daily reports and spreadsheets.
Conducted I-9 reviews, updated and maintained client and employee data, performed clerical duties, and handled accounts receivable and payable.

skills.name: Crisis Intervention
skills.explanation: Provided crisis intervention services to victims of domestic violence and their families for over a decade, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Trauma-Informed Care
skills.explanation: Provided trauma-informed care to victims of domestic violence and their families, showing strong proficiency in this area.

skills.name: Case Management
skills.explanation: Conducted daily service logs, case notes, and referral outcome reports, suggesting strong proficiency in case management.

skills.name: Group Facilitation
skills.explanation: Facilitated support groups and life skills workshops, showing a solid working proficiency in group facilitation.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Managed the day-to-day operations of the outreach center, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Administrative Support
skills.explanation: Provided administrative support in various roles, including handling phone calls, billing and invoicing, and preparing daily reports and spreadsheets, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Data Entry
skills.explanation: Updated and maintained client and employee data, suggesting some practical experience in data entry.

skills.name: Accounts Receivable and Payable
skills.explanation: Handled accounts receivable and payable in various administrative roles, showing some practical experience in this area.

skills.name: Microsoft Office
skills.explanation: Likely used Microsoft Office for administrative tasks, but no specific experience is mentioned, suggesting some practical experience.
